posts.postText:
Your In-Game name: LouistheRespawnFag
Your Steam ID: STEAM_0:1:30286917
Reason: RDM'ing? (WHAT?)  and killing Afks 
Length of Ban: A day
What server were you playing?: TTT
Who banned you?: Sarver
Why should we unban you?: Sarver was next to quite a few un-id''ed bodies and I didn't know he was afk I was detective and I got shot from that same direction (under the bridge) and I killed him and I get blamed for rdm but i had a valid reason to kill him

There were 0 unid'd bodies in the mote, you just ran straight and killed 2 afk's infront of me, then came up to me and shot me in the face, theres no possible way you could think one of the 3 ppl shot at you when we all had crowbars out and were standing still.
no there were only 2 people under the bridge and i saw an afk or 2 right under the bridge

Even still, you can't appeal in an unban request if it's only a day.
Let this be a lesson to you, not to kill AFK's in the future.
